name: Flux Grenade
description: An explosive grenade which deals additional damage when attached to enemies.

name: Double Jump
description: Jump a second time after leaving the ground.

name: Arc Blade
description: Charge your blade with Arc Light and consume your foes with lightning.

name: Blink Strike
description: A powerful melee attack with extended range.

name: Path Forgotten
description: Training focused on toughness and speed.

name: Fleet Footed
description: Increases maximum sprint speed and extends slide distance.

name: Way of the Drifter
description: Training focused on all attributes.

name: Encore
description: Killing an enemy with Arc Blade extends its duration.

name: Skip Grenade
description: A grenade which splits on impact, creating multiple projectiles which seek enemies.

name: Higher Jump
description: Upgrades Double Jump for even greater height.

name: Showstopper
description: Press during Arc Blade to damage nearby enemies.

name: Backstab
description: Hitting an enemy from behind with Blink Strike causes significantly more damage.

name: Path Forbidden
description: Training focused on battle recovery and speed.

name: Quick Draw
description: Weapons ready immediately.

name: Way of the Fearless
description: Training focused on toughness at all costs.

name: Stalker
description: Gain invisibility after crouching in place for a short time.

name: Arcbolt Grenade
description: A grenade that chains bolts of lightning to nearby enemies.

name: Better Control
description: Upgrades Double Jump for better directional control while in the air.

name: Razor's Edge
description: Press during Arc Blade to unleash a destructive wave of energy that travels along the ground.

name: Escape Artist
description: Hitting an enemy with Blink Strike grants brief invisibility.

name: Path Unknown
description: Training focused on battle recovery and toughness.

name: Shadowjack
description: Increases the duration of invisibility effects.

name: Way of the Nomad
description: Training focused on maximum battle recovery.

name: Hungering Blade
description: Kills with Arc Blade and Blink Strike immediately regenerate health.

name: Blink
description: A short distance teleport that replaces Double Jump.

name: Vanish
description: Press during Arc Blade to disappear from sight.

name: Fast Twitch
description: Reduces the cooldown of Blink Strike.
